About me

I am a B.Tech student specializing in Computer Science and Engineering with a strong focus on full-stack web development. With a solid foundation in programming languages and software development principles, I am proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies. My technical skill set includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern libraries and frameworks like React, Angular, and Bootstap for the front end, as well as Node.js, Express, and databases like MongoDB and SQL for the back end.

My hobbies include playing badminton, stargazing as an avid astrophile, and spending time with cats as a true ailurophile and learning spanish these days.

Projects

Phone-Mart: Phobne shopping web App

Phone-Mart is a smooth phone buying website.The website features a modern design with a responsive layout, making it accessible on various devices. Key sections include a prominent header with navigation links to essential pages like About, Brand, and Contact Us, along with a shopping cart feature. A dynamic carousel displays promotional banners, enticing visitors with ongoing sales and new products. The site also highlights PhoneMart's commitment to customer satisfaction through an "About Us" section that emphasizes its mission and values. Product offerings are showcased in a visually appealing grid format, displaying essential details like prices and the option to add items to the shopping cart. Overall, this project aims to deliver a seamless shopping experience, combining attractive design with functionality to attract and retain customers in the competitive online marketplace.
